title: Multi-modal Masked Siamese Network Improves Chest X-Ray Representation Learning
details: S Shurrab, A Guerra-Manzanares, FE Shamout - arXiv preprint arXiv:2407.04449, 2024
abstract: Self-supervised learning methods for medical images primarily rely on the imaging modality during pretraining. While such approaches deliver promising results, they do not leverage associated patient or scan information collected within Electronic …
